      • TLDADoc

        public TLDADoc​(java.lang.String document,
               int numTopics,
               int numVocab,
               int numPaths)
        Initialize the object with a document
        参数:
        document - Document
        numTopics - Number of topics
        numVocab - Vocabulary size
        numPaths - Number of total paths
